pages.text: $(item)Battery Boxes$() $(major)store Zaps$(). Higher tier Battery Boxes store more Zaps, and input/output higher Voltage.$(br2)Battery Boxes have 5 input faces and 1 output face.$(br2)Battery Boxes can $(major)charge and discharge items$() like $(l:ftbic:items/battery)Batteries$() in their GUIs.
Similar to Battery Boxes are Transformers, which are mentioned $(l:ftbic:first/zaps#transformers)here$().$(br2)$(red)$(l)Stored energy is lost if the Battery Box is broken.$()
